segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, her shoe splashed in that filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dirt from the floor mixing with the water, what a gross mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing everywhere, hands in the cookie jar like animals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, crumbs probably falling into the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, begging with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman is getting damp, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping, cabinets that should be clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't make this appealing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of slipping in that slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
